Article Title: Apr 6 - PM Modi in Sri Lanka, India's first vertical-lift sea bridge, protest in Pakistan
Article Text:
• PM and Sri Lankan President to inaugurate India-aided projects

• Home Minister on three-day visit to J&K

• Quetta protest over Baloch leader arrests

• IPL 2025 – SRH vs GT Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium, Hyderabad

Unlocking the past

Last updated at 9.30pm | Compiled by Rajesh Sharma

Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Sri Lankan President Dissanayaka will travel together to the historic city of Anuradhapura . There they will pay their respects at the Mahabodhi Temple and jointly inaugurate two India-aided projects, after which the Indian PM will return home.Home Minister Amit Shah is in the Union Territory to hold security review meetings and assess political developments with BJP MLAs. His itinerary includes a tour of border areas, meetings with families of police martyrs, and a review of arrangements for the Amarnath Yatra.The Balochistan National Party-Mengal is set to march in Quetta, demanding freedom for activist Mahrang Baloch and others from the Baloch Yakjehti Committee. Akhtar Mengal who heads the party has urged supporters to resist obstructions and peacefully protest the arrests.Sunrisers Hyderabad will hope to break their three-match losing streak by refining their aggressive game plan against Gujarat Titans. Their inconsistent batting and leaky bowling have left them at the bottom of the IPL standings. Gujarat Titans have been buoyed by their recent form and a solid batting core.Stars from Real Madrid and Barcelona - including Carlos Puyol, Xavi, Luis Figo, and Michael Owen - will clash in the much-anticipated 'Legends Faceoff' at DY Patil Stadium in Navi Mumbai. It’s the first match to bring these global football icons together on Indian soil and offers fans a nostalgic showcase as historic rivalries are reignited.set to be inaugurated by PM Modi in Tamil NaduTwo lakh diyas will be lit on thein Ayodhya. Drones will be used to spray water from the river Saryu on devotees as part of the celebrations.Indian Super League football match -Max Verstappen of Red Bull will start from pole position at thefor scientific advances to be announced in USFoundation day of Bharatiya Janata Party in 1980Birth anniversary of cricketerBirth anniversary of Bollywood actressThewere reborn in 1896The US enteredin 1917Robert E. Peary and Matthew A. Henson became thein 1909
Article Summary: Pm and sri lankan president to inaugurate india-aided projects. Home minister on three-day visit to j&k. Quetta protest over baloch leader arrests. Ipl 2025 – srh vs gt rajiv gandhi international stadium, hyderabad. Football legends set for iconic showdown in mumbai.

Article Title: "Josh has to fight him": Hailee Steinfeld’s "chemistry" with co-star Michael B. Jordan has fans losing their minds
Article Text:
Image via TheImageDirect.com

Fans are excited by the “chemistry” between Hailee Steinfeld and her co-star, Micahel B. Jordan



Josh Allen has been with Hailee Steinfeld as she promotes her new movie



Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld have shown the world how deep their love is for one another. Recently, the two were spotted at Hailee Steinfeld’s movie premiere, Sinners, as Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld turned heads with their looks. The two walked hand in hand and seemed to have a great time together. But recently, a video of Hailee Steinfeld and Michael B. Jordan has gone viral, and fans are losing their minds over it.In a video posted by Entertainment Tonight, Hailee Steinfeld was giving an interview on the red carpet at the premiere when the interviewer joked to look behind her. Hailee Steinfeld turns back to spot her co-star in the movie, Michael B. Jordan and jokingly says, “GO AWAY! we’re talking about you.”Michael B. Jordan laughs at it and pretends to hear what she is saying in her interview. This video was enough for fans to lose their minds over the “chemistry” they have together.A fan posted on X, “I’m making her file a restraining order against him if I’m Josh Allen ngl”, while another fan wrote, “Josh Allen gonna have to fight Michael B Jordan soon the way this press tour is going”.A third fan wrote, “Everyone talking about Shameik when she’s literally married to Josh Allen 😂😂 I’d be sick to my mf stomach if I was him”, while another user joked, “Imma send this to Josh Allen before his next afc championship game”.A fifth fan noted, “Hailee Steinfeld and Michael B Jordan went the Glenn Powell and Sydney Sweeney school of flirting with your co-stars just enough that fans become instantly obsessed”Another fan posted, “This is crazy work knowing she got Josh Allen at home lol”However, Josh Allen was also present at the Sinners movie premiere as he has been spending his offseason, accompanying his fiancee, Hailee Steinfeld, to her work commitments.Both Josh Allen and Hailee Steinfeld have been extremely public about their relationship after they got engaged in November 2024.Neither Josh Allen nor Hailee Steinfeld have reacted to all the speculations going around with her co-star Michael B. Jordan. All in all, it seems like Hailee Steinfeld has found a great friend in Michael B. Jordan as they spent a considerable amount of time together shooting for their new movie, Sinners.The horror movie, Sinners, will be releasing on 18th April and fans are expecting it to be a huge hit, considering the buzz around the movie.As for Josh Allen, he is taking a break during the offseason after he signed a $300+ million deal with his team recently.Also Read: Josh Allen’s thoughtful gesture at Hailee Steinfeld’s movie premiere has fans losing their minds over it
Article Summary: Josh allen has been with hailee steinfeld as she promotes her new movie, sinners. Recently, a video of the two has gone viral, and fans are losing their minds over it. A fan posted on x, “i’m making her file a restraining order against him if i'm josh allen ngl”

Article Title: “Nobody likes this guy”: Gary Bettman’s awkward interaction with Alex Ovechkin’s wife fuels criticism across social media
Article Text:
Alex Ovechkin continues his pursuit of Wayne Gretzky’s all-time goal record, scoring his 892nd career goal despite the Washington Capitals’ 5-1 loss to the Carolina Hurricanes. The hockey world watches as Ovechkin nears Gretzky’s milestone, while a celebratory moment with NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman sparks online criticism.

Awkward, cringeworthy handshake between Anastasia Shubskaya and Gary Bettman

One of the most compelling narratives in the NHL right now is Alex Ovechkin’s pursuit of Wayne Gretzky’s all-time goal record. On Wednesday night, despite the Washington Capitals falling 5-1 to the Carolina Hurricanes, Ovechkin was the lone bright spot for his team. The 39-year-old sniper unleashed a powerful shot from the high slot in the second period, beating goaltender Frederik Andersen and notching the 892nd goal of his storied career. Alex Ovechkin's wife shared a celebratory high-five with Capitals owner Ted Leonsis and then attempted to include NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman in the momentAlex Ovechkin, a 13-time NHL All-Star and three-time Hart Trophy winner, continues to edge closer to one of the greatest milestones in hockey history. With 892 goals under his belt, he's now just two away from tying Wayne Gretzky’s iconic all-time goal record and three from standing alone at the top. As the countdown narrows, the hockey world watches with anticipation, ready to witness history in the making.“If he breaks my record, I will be the first guy to stand there and shake his hand," Gretzky told reporters of Ovechkin’s chase for history. “I think it is great for our sport. I am proud of what I have accomplished. I know what I did was really hard, but I think it will only be positive for the game if he can break the record.”Following Alex Ovechkin’s latest goal—bringing him within one of his 14th 40-goal season—his wife, Anastasia Shubskaya, was visibly excited in the stands. She shared a celebratory high-five with Capitals owner Ted Leonsis and then attempted to include NHL Commissioner Gary Bettman in the moment. What followed was an awkward, cringeworthy handshake that quickly caught fans’ attention. Given Bettman’s already unpopular status among many NHL supporters, the uncomfortable exchange only fueled more criticism of him across social media.“‘Celly’ that man barely shook her hand,” one fan wrote. “Bettman try to care challenge impossible,” another joked. “The second she looked away his face got so sour,” added a third fan. “What an awkward celebration ..,” one mocked. “Gary like who dis ,” another one quipped.“Nobody likes this guy ,” remarked one fan.Also Read: “An idiot jumping around”: Alex Ovechkin’s epic response to Don Cherry’s criticism resurfaces as he nears Gretzky’s goal record Fans wasted no time reacting online, with many mocking the awkward moment and using it as yet another reason to criticize Bettman. Social media lit up with sarcastic remarks and memes, as users wisecracks about Bettman’s lack of charm even during a celebration.
Article Summary: Alex ovechkin scored his 892nd goal of his career on wednesday night. The washington capitals lost 5-1 to the carolina hurricanes. His wife shared a celebratory high-five with capitals owner ted leonsis. She then attempted to include nhl commissioner gary bettman in the moment.

Article Title: Watch: Khushdil Shah attacks spectator after anti-Pakistan taunts; PCB issues statement
Article Text:
Khushdil Shah incident after PAK vs NZ 3rd ODI (Photo Credit: X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Jos Buttler Exclusive Interview: I owe Jayawardene for letting me open in T20

NEW DELHI: Tensions boiled over after Pakistan’s crushing 3-0 ODI series loss to New Zealand, as all-rounder Khushdil Shah was involved in a heated exchange with two Afghan spectators at Bay Oval on Saturday.The confrontation unfolded shortly after the match concluded, adding an unpleasant twist to an already disappointing day for the visitors.According to the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB), Khushdil was subjected to verbal abuse from individuals in the stands who reportedly hurled anti-Pakistan slogans and inappropriate language.In a statement, the PCB said, "The Pakistan cricket team management has strongly condemned the abusive language directed at national players by foreign spectators. During the match today, foreign spectators hurled inappropriate remarks at cricketers present on the field."Also See: RR vs PBKS Live Score, IPL 2025 “When anti-Pakistan slogans emerged, cricketer Khushdil Shah stepped in and urged the spectators to refrain. In response, Afghan spectators escalated the situation by using further inappropriate language in Pashto. Following the Pakistani team's complaint, stadium officials intervened and ejected the two disruptive spectators,” it added.Eyewitness videos circulating on social media showed Khushdil reacting emotionally, appearing to move toward the crowd before being held back by team officials.The incident comes amid an already turbulent tour for Pakistan, who were outclassed in all formats.In the final ODI, Pakistan fell 43 runs short of New Zealand’s 264-8 in a rain-shortened 42-over game.Once again, their batting crumbled under pressure despite a solid start, with Babar Azam (50), Abdullah Shafique (33), and Mohammad Rizwan (37) showing some resistance.Ben Sears continued his sensational run, claiming 5/34 to become the first New Zealander to take back-to-back five-wicket hauls in ODIs.He was ably supported by Jacob Duffy (2/40), who claimed the crucial wicket of Rizwan.Khushdil’s on-field performance was overshadowed by the post-match drama, but the PCB’s swift action and strong stance against spectator misconduct underscore the need for maintaining respect and decorum in international cricket arenas.ALSO READ: Lights out! Pakistan vs New Zealand 3rd ODI observes bizarre power cut - Watch
Article Summary: Khushdil shah involved in heated exchange with two afghan spectators at bay oval on saturday. Pakistan cricket board (pcb) said khushdill was subjected to verbal abuse from individuals in the stands who reportedly hurled anti-pakistan slogans and inappropriate language.

Article Title: “Team Khabib sent an Assassin” - UFC Fans hilariously react as mystery man attacks Conor McGregor at BKFC 71
Article Text:
Conor McGregor. Photo by Collins

BKFC 71

mystery man

Michael Chandler and Khabib Nurmagomedov gets dragged as fans comment on the enraged attack on Conor McGregor

Fans react to the enraged audience’s attack

Irish fighter Conor McGregor has been making headlines recently owing to his political posts directed towards the Irish government, as well as his repeated pitch to run for the presidential post of the country. Being a part-owner of the BKFC , the fighter was also seen promoting the events of the company globally. As part of this world tour, the fighter-turned-promoter flew to Dubai for the, where he was attacked by atowards the end of the event. Fans have immediately started speculating as to who this could be.It’s been almost 4 years since Conor McGregor was seen fighting, and fans were almost on edge when the Notorious was just inches away from getting involved in a BKFC brawl. On April 4, 2025, McGregor arrived in Dubai for the BKFC 71, an event that marks the promotion’s entry into the Middle Eastern market. Towards the end of the event, when the promoters were vacating the venue, an enraged audience member rushed towards McGregor, who was then signing for a fan, but was intervened in between by the security personnel.The Notorious, as seen in the footage, was intrigued by the incident and was eager to see who the attacking individual was. The incident, however, was hilariously interpreted by the fans of the combat sports all over the social media platform X.Members and fans of the combat sports community have not seen The Notorious within the ring for a very long time. The short brawl at BKFC 71 led to the formation of an opinion thread where the fans had their share of hilarious takes on the entire incident.One of the fans wrote, “Conor was wanting a piece”Another one wrote, “why does conor look like the most civilized here lmfao”A fan even dragged in Michael Chandler, who had waited a long time for McGregor to get back into the ring ever since the latter pulled out of their scheduled bout at UFC 303, “@MikeChandlerMMA Connors only fight this year”Another user even went on to refer to the Khabib Nurmagomedov and Conor McGregor public feud, when the latter launched an attack on the bus carrying Khabib’s team as a response to the Dagestani fighter slapping Artem Lobov, a member of McGregor’s team,“@TeamKhabib sent an assassin but conor doesnt hide in a bus like a daggy coward. Sláinte @TheNotoriousMMA”Also read: Former two-weight division champion shed lights on his relationship with Dana White - “Dana is still pissed at me” The details of the attacker have not been made public yet. On the other hand, McGregor seems to be fully invested in two major things currently - his political venture and his duties as a promoter of BKFC. Fans, however, have started speculating if this incident would instigate the itch in him to get back in the ring anytime soon.
Article Summary: Conor mcgregor was attacked by an audience member at bkfc 71 in dubai. The irish fighter has been making headlines recently owing to his political posts directed towards the irish government. Fans have started speculating if this incident would instigate the itch in him to get back in the ring anytime soon.

Article Title: IPL match today, SRH vs GT: Dream 11 Team Prediction, head to head, Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium pitch report, weather in Hyderabad
Article Text:
Gujarat Titans captain Shubman Gill and Sunrisers Hyderabad skipper Pat Cummins.

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

SRH vs GT IPL 2025, Hyderabad weather prediction

Sunrisers Hyderabad (SRH) face Gujarat Titans (GT) at the Rajiv Gandhi International Stadium in Hyderabad today, desperate to halt a three-match losing streak.Despite an explosive 286-run start to the IPL season, SRH’s all-out attacking approach has backfired, with scores of 190, 163, and 120 in the subsequent games.Their batting stars, including Travis Head, Ishan Kishan, and Heinrich Klaasen, have failed to deliver consistently, and the bowling unit — led by skipper Pat Cummins — has struggled, with high economy rates and no bowler completing four overs in every match.Currently at the bottom of the points table, SRH risk slipping out of playoff contention.In contrast, the Gujarat Titans are gaining momentum, buoyed by a big win over RCB. With a strong top order of Gill, Sudharsan and Buttler, and finishers like Rutherford and Tewatia, they look balanced.While Rabada’s absence is a blow, options like Coetzee or Phillips could fill the gap. Titans also boast a more disciplined bowling attack, giving them an edge.Hyderabad’s red soil pitch promises bounce and carry, but it slows as the ball ages. Despite average boundaries (69m, 67m, 79m), on average 24 sixes are hit per game. It’s a dry, grassless, firm surface. Batting first is ideal, as past matches saw 200+ totals in all innings.Travis Head, Abhishek Sharma, Ishan Kishan, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Heinrich Klaasen (wk), Aniket Verma, Abhinav Manohar, Pat Cummins (c), Simarjeet Singh, Harshal Patel, Mohammed Shami– Zeeshan Ansari/Adam ZampaSai Sudharsan, Shubman Gill (c), Jos Buttler (wk), Shahrukh Khan, Rahul Tewatia, Arshad Khan, Rashid Khan, Ravisrinivasan Sai Kishore, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Ishant Sharma– Sherfane Rutherford/Washington SundarPat Cummins (c), Ishan Kishan (wk), Atharva Taide, Abhinav Manohar, Aniket Verma, Sachin Baby, Heinrich Klaasen, Travis Head, Harshal Patel, Kamindu Mendis, Wiaan Mulder, Abhishek Sharma, Nitish Kumar Reddy, Mohammed Shami, Rahul Chahar, Adam Zampa, Simarjeet Singh, Zeeshan Ansari, Jaydev Unadkat and Eshan Malinga.Shubman Gill (C), Jos Buttler, B. Sai Sudharshan, Shahrukh Khan, Mohammed Siraj, Prasidh Krishna, Rahul Tewatia, Rashid Khan, Nishant Sindhu, Mahipal Lomror, Kumar Kushagra, Anuj Rawat, Manav Suthar, Washington Sundar, Gerald Coetzee, Mohmmad Arshad Khan, Gurnoor Singh Brar, Sherfane Rutherford, R. Sai Kishore, Ishant Sharma, Jayant Yadav, Glenn Phillips, Kareem Janat, Kulwant Khejroliya.SRH and GT have faced each other 4 times, and GT hold the upper hand, winning 3 matches. SRH won their first encounter in 2022, but after that GT have won three consecutive matches.Their last scheduled match between the two teams in Hyderabad was abandoned without a ball bowled due to rain.As per Accuweather, Hyderabad is expected to be incredibly hot with temperatures slated to hit as high as 38 degrees Celsius. The conditions are expected to remain hot for the 7:30pm start, with temperatures hovering over 30 degrees Celsius.
Article Summary: Sunrisers hyderabad (srh) face gujarat titans (gt) at the rajiv gandhi international stadium in hyderabad today. Srh are desperate to halt a three-match losing streak. The gujarat titans are gaining momentum, buoyed by a big win over rcb. Srh and gt have faced each other 4 times, and gt hold the upper hand, winning 3 matches.

Article Title: IPL match today, PBKS vs RR: Dream 11 Team Prediction, head to head, New Punjab Cricket Association Stadium pitch report, weather in Mullanpur
Article Text:
Shreyas Iyer during a practice session ahead of an Indian Premier League (IPL) 2025 T20 cricket match. (PTI)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Considering their past record, who do you see as the favorite in the PBKS vs RR matchup? Punjab Kings Rajasthan Royals

Pitch report for PBKS vs RR

PBKS vs RR Dream11 Team Prediction

PBKS vs RR squads, IPL match Today

Punjab Kings squad:

Rajasthan Royals squad:

PBKS vs RR Head-to-Head Record

PBKS vs RR IPL 2025, Mullanpur weather prediction

A year ago, the Punjab Kings (PBKS) faced significant challenges, including confusion over Shashank Singh’s status, Shikhar Dhawan's poor performance, and a disappointing ninth-place finish with only five wins, marking their tenth consecutive year without a playoff appearance.Currently, there’s a sense of calm surrounding the team. Under the leadership of Ricky Ponting and Shreyas Iyer, they have kicked off IPL 2025 with two away victories and aim to improve their home record.In IPL 2024, PBKS managed just one win from five games at Mullanpur, but this year’s squad boasts impressive depth that makes them a formidable contender. While Glenn Maxwell, Marcus Stoinis, and Marco Jansen are all strong batters, the top order has performed so well that their contributions have seldom been necessary.On the other hand, the Rajasthan Royals (RR) are dealing with multiple challenges, starting with Yashasvi Jaiswal's sluggish start and questions about their batting depth. To address this, they have been flexible with their lineup, which was evident in their recent win over CSK, thanks to a standout performance from Nitish Rana that capped off their stint in Guwahati.Going by history, don't expect big scores between PBKS and RR in Mullanpur. Totals of 180-190 runs have been competitive at this venue with spinners finding an edge.Also See: RR vs PBKS Live Score, IPL 2025 In all 28 T20s played here, only two innings have recorded a 200-plus total. Mumbai Indians’ 192-run total in IPL 2024 is the biggest in the league's history.Rajasthan Royals Predicted XI: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson(c/w), Nitish Rana, Ryan Parag, Dhruv Jurel, Wanindu Hasaranga, Shimron Hetmyer, Jofra Archer, Mahesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep SharmaImpact Player – Shubham Dubey/Fazalhaq FarooqiPunjab Kings Predicted XI: Prabhsimran Singh (w), Priyansh Arya, Shreyas Iyer (c), Shashank Singh, Markus Stoinis, Glen Maxwell, Suryansh Shedge, Azmatullah Omarzai, Marco Jansen, Arshdeep Singh and Yuzvendra Chanal.Impact Player – Nehal WadheraPriyansh Arya, Prabhsimran Singh(w), Shreyas Iyer(c), Azmatullah Omarzai, Glenn Maxwell, Marcus Stoinis, Shashank Singh, Suryansh Shedge, Marco Jansen, Arshdeep Singh, Yuzvendra Chahal, Vijaykumar Vyshak, Nehal Wadhera, Praveen Dubey, Harpreet Brar, Vishnu Vinod, Yash Thakur, Aaron Hardie, Kuldeep Sen, Harnoor Singh, Musheer Khan, Pyla Avinash, Xavier Bartlett, Lockie Ferguson, Josh Inglis.Yashasvi Jaiswal, Shubham Dubey, Nitish Rana, Riyan Parag(c), Dhruv Jurel(w), Shimron Hetmyer, Jofra Archer, Maheesh Theekshana, Tushar Deshpande, Sandeep Sharma, Fazalhaq Farooqi, Sanju Samson, Kunal Singh Rathore, Akash Madhwal, Kumar Kartikeya, Kwena Maphaka, Wanindu Hasaranga, Yudhvir Singh Charak, Ashok Sharma, Vaibhav Suryavanshi.PBKS and RR have faced each other 28 times, and RR hold the upper hand, winning 16 matches. The other 12 have gone Punjab's way. The last five matches have been largely even with Royals winning three and two for Kings. In IPL 2024, both had one win each with Royals clinching the contest in Mullanpur.As per Accuweather, Chandigarh is expected to incredibly hot with temperatures slated to hit 30 degrees Celsius throughout the day. However, the conditions are expected to cool down slightly for the 7:30pm start, with temperatures dipping to 27 degrees Celsius.
Article Summary: Punjab kings face rajasthan royals in indian premier league (ipl) 2025 t20 match. Punjab kings have won two away matches in ipl 2025 so far and aim to improve their home record. Rr have struggled with yashasvi jaiswal's sluggish start and questions about their batting depth.

Article Title: Will Shohei Ohtani play today against Philadelphia Phillies? Latest update on Los Angeles Dodgers star's injury report (April 5, 2025)
Article Text:
Will Shohei Ohtani play today against Philadelphia Phillies? Latest update on Los Angeles Dodgers star's injury report (Image Source: Getty)

The Los Angeles Dodgers’ Shohei Ohtani is set to face the Philadelphia Phillies today despite early struggles

Uncertainty of the team’s lineup: The Philadelphia Phillies' key players’ injury status updated

Today’s game is going to be a pack of powerful players as the two major baseball teams, the Philadelphia Phillies and the Los Angeles Dodgers , face each other. The match is going to be on 5th April 2025, starting at 4:05 p.m. ET at the Citizens Bank Park in Philadelphia. The fans are overwhelmed with emotions to watch their team win the game today.The viewers can switch on to Fox Sports 1 channel to enjoy the match live from their home who missed getting the tickets for the game today. NBC Sports Philadelphia+ channel will be broadcasting the match live for the people in Philadelphia, while the people in Los Angeles can enjoy the match on SportsNet LA channel. On the other hand, the people, if having access, can tune into Fubo to enjoy live streaming of the game today.The star player, Shohei Ohtani, of an amazing baseball team, the Los Angeles Dodgers, is predicted to be in the team’s lineup today, given his performance in the recent matches. Shohei Ohtani is an outstanding player of the team who has been included in the team’s lineup in all the recent matches of the Los Angeles Dodgers.The Los Angeles Dodgers lost their first match to the Philadelphia Phillies, where Shohei Ohtani was into the baserunning during his eighth innings. Despite having major elbow surgery, Shohei Ohtani continues to play for the team in this season and is considered a hitter on the field.The Philadelphia Phillies has some of the major baseball players of the season and has been creating a legacy in the past years. As unpredictable as any MLB can be, it becomes an unfortunate scene for any player in the team when they are assigned to the injured list.Garrett Stubbs along Cristopher Sánchez are predicted to be in the lineup for today’s game against the Los Angeles Dodgers. The team has placed Seranthony Domínguez on the injured list and expects him to be back by the end of April where whereas Trea Turner, who was supposed to be back in the team by now, is expected to be sidelined.Also Read: Shohei Ohtani's complete endorsement list: Inside MLB's biggest marketing machine

The match is going to be on 5th april 2025, starting at 4:05 p.m. Et at the citizens bank park in philadelphia. The viewers can switch on to fox sports 1 channel to enjoy the match live from their home.

Article Title: Bill Belichick’s girlfriend Jordon Hudson celebrates her 24th birthday with a sweet tribute to his new UNC chapter
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Inside Jordon Hudson’s 24th birthday bash and how she’s honoring Bill Belichick’s latest coaching move



Jordon Hudson ’s 24th birthday wasn’t just about cakes and candles—it became a heartfelt celebration of love, loyalty, and life’s unexpected journeys. The former college cheerleader and current partner of legendary NFL coach Bill Belichick used her special day to offer a unique tribute to the man who has stood beside her despite the headlines, criticism, and their 48-year age gap.On April 4, Jordon Hudson took to Instagram to showcase a thoughtful snapshot: a bouquet of red roses and a University of North Carolina basketball jersey with “Jordon” emblazoned above the number 24. It wasn’t just a birthday nod—it was a clever homage to her own age and Michael Jordan’s college legacy, all while acknowledging Belichick’s new beginning with the Tar Heels. The jersey symbolized more than a gift—it marked her deep-rooted support for Belichick as he transitions into his first-ever college football coaching role.It’s not the first time Hudson has publicly backed her partner. After facing online scrutiny over their relationship, she shared a bold message on Instagram in December 2024: "Nothing changed for us in 2024 except for 'public knowledge': yet somehow everything changed. Going strong. I can't wait to take punches for you in 2025. Keep swinging, Keyboard Warriors. Your illusion of righteousness only fuels my authenticity." Her statement echoed the kind of emotional resilience that often keeps high-profile relationships afloat.The pair's journey began in an unlikely setting—on a flight to Florida in February 2021. Hudson, then a college student with a passion for philosophy, had Belichick sign her “Deductive Logic” textbook. He penned a note that read, “Thanks for giving me a course on logic! Safe travels! Bill Belichick,” complete with Super Bowl win numbers. That simple exchange bloomed into a connection that, despite public skepticism, has only grown stronger.In February 2025, Hudson commemorated their four-year “meetiversary” with a post saying, “Happy Meetiversary @billbelichick — Cheers 🥂 to the fact that you still let me give you lengthy philosophical lectures four years later.” A slideshow accompanied the caption, featuring a touching photo of the couple holding hands during Super Bowl week in New Orleans.Her recent birthday post also included a stylish red beaded handbag by STAUD, inspired by the Year of the Snake—a nod to Hudson’s creative side. Fans have often seen glimpses of her DIY flair, whether it’s bedazzling a UNC sweatshirt or crafting a rhinestone lobster purse to raise awareness for Maine fishermen.While Belichick is gearing up for his new role at UNC, their life together continues to reflect a delicate balance between legacy and love. From philosophical musings to beachside antics—like the viral "Billates" workout where Hudson was seen balanced on Belichick’s feet—the couple is redefining what it means to navigate fame and age differences with grace, humor, and authenticity.Also Read: Aaron Rodgers left more than memories for Olivia Munn — a haunting truth she can’t shake Their story proves that sometimes, love takes off in the most unexpected places—like 30,000 feet in the air—and lands in a partnership that neither logic nor judgment can define.
Article Summary: Jordon hudson celebrated her 24th birthday with a thoughtful tribute to bill belichick. The university of north carolina basketball jersey with "jordon" emblazoned above the number 24 was a clever homage to her own age and michael jordan’s college legacy.

Article Title: Japanese Grand Prix 2025 Weather Update: Wet conditions expected at Suzuka – good or bad news?
Article Text:
Image credit: Formula 1/Twitter

A rainy race day on the cards at the Japanese Grand Prix After Australia, another wet and wild race is on the cards at the Japanese Grand Prix on Sunday. Red Bull’s Max Verstappen secured pole position on Saturday, setting the stage for the final race at Suzuka. According to the weather forecast, there are chances of rain during the race, which has made his fans even more confident about his victory. However, it's difficult to predict what will happen at the Suzuka Circuit , as it’s not just Verstappen in the race—McLaren’s Lando Norris is also a strong contender and is high on confidence after winning the rain-affected race in Melbourne.The race will start at 2 p.m. local time. It will take place over 53 laps of the 5.807-kilometre Suzuka Circuit and is expected to last around 2 hours.According to the weather forecast shared by the FIA, showers are likely in the morning, which could dampen the dry grass. The temperature is expected to be higher than on the first two days, hovering around 17 degrees Celsius. After the morning showers, it may become a bit cloudy, with slightly reduced chances of rain during the race. However, the timing of the rain is unpredictable, and track conditions could fluctuate between wet and dry throughout the day.The storm and rain in Australia had overturned race strategies for many, resulting in multiple incidents and crashes on the wet track. In Japan, there's more to worry about than just the track. The frequent grass fires during practice sessions and qualifying race left drivers frustrated due to multiple red flags and the loss of precious time. Drivers may lose sleep over the weather prediction for Sunday, but many Formula 1 fans are expecting a more unpredictable and exciting race.As the official X (formerly Twitter) handle of Formula 1 asked the fans, “Anyone packed an umbrella?” many expressed their desire to see a wet race. One fan tweeted, “That would make things interesting.” Another wrote, “I would actually like to see a wet race. More chances to see Max coming out on top.” “Oh, exciting... Australia repeat?” asked a fan. One fan also said sarcastically, “At least the grass won’t burn.” Another comment read, “What’s with F1 scheduling races on every rainy weekend? Get it together, FIA.”Also Read: Grass Fires at the Japanese Grand Prix: Causes, concerns and why current efforts aren't enough Many, including Lewis Hamilton and Oscar Piastri, struggled in the rain-hit season opener in Melbourne. Whether Max Verstappen will overpower Norris again with a magical lap in the Sunday race remains to be seen.
Article Summary: A rainy race day on the cards at the japanese grand prix on sunday. Red bull’s max verstappen secured pole position on saturday, setting the stage for the final race at suzuka. According to the weather forecast, there are chances of rain during the race.

Article Title: Digvesh Rathi: From learning the craft by watching Sunil Narine videos to becoming Rishabh Pant’s ace at LSG
Article Text:
Digvesh Rathi (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Which aspect of Digvesh Singh Rathi's journey do you find most inspiring? His success in local leagues His dedication to improving his skills His resilience after rejection

Gully To Glory: Ramandeep Singh's journey from Chandigarh to Team India via KKR

NEW DELHI: Around five years back, the Delhi and District Cricket Association (DDCA) organised open nets for its Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy (SMAT) probables at a Delhi University (DU) college ground. Among the hundreds who had assembled was a young Digvesh Singh Rathi who got a chance to bowl after observing action from the sidelines.The batters, featuring plenty of Indian Premier League ( IPL ) regulars, were hitting the ball out of the small North Campus ground, and one of Rathi's deliveries received similar treatment. Without a ball to continue, he walked up to a member of the coaching staff and requested for a replacement, only to be asked to stand in a corner.Also See: IPL Live Score, RR vs PBKS His trial was done. He never got an opportunity to bowl again and didn't feature in the shortlist which was released.Rejection was not new, but the lesson learnt that afternoon changed his bowling and life for good. Not conceding a six became his new obsession, and with no state-level opportunities coming his way, the highly competitive club and corporate fixtures in Delhi-NCR were the only games he looked forward to. Even in those matches, where he was paid for an appearance, not conceding runs remained his motto to keep getting regular games and match fees."Run lagte hai to bulate nahi hai ye dubara, isi liye kheech ke daalta hu (If I get hit for runs, they don't call again. That's why I bowl tight)," Rathi would say whenever he was asked about his bowling.A bowler who modelled his game by watching Sunil Narine , Rathi began as the usual off-spinner who bowled a menacing carrom ball in his early days. The art of hiding the ball was picked up by watching Narine, and while it gave him control and kept the economy rate in check, the wickets column didn't have substantial contributions. He identified it as something to be worked on after attending trials for Delhi Capitals and Mumbai Indians, and a plan was prepared.After watching hours of Wanindu Hasranga footage on his phone, Rathi figured out that a googly was needed. He worked on it and finally cracked a delivery which turns differently, and more than his carrom. His regular celebration, before the notebook gesture went viral, was inspired by the Sri Lankan spinner and completed his bowling package.Rathi has played nearly 300 local games, had a stint with Delhi Capitals as a net bowler, played for Delhi U-25 in the 2022-23 season, but the magical paddle went up only at the IPL mega auction in 2024 when Lucknow Super Giants secured him for Rs 30 lakh.Part of the Delhi Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy squad that season, thanks to his exceptional bowling in the Delhi Premier League where he was the find of the season with 14 scalps from 10 games, the 25-year-old watched the auction from his hotel room and was a relieved man. "IPL khelna hai... ," was something he would say often but was lost for words when his phone started buzzing after the bid.Just like his bowling, his cricketing journey has been anything but conventional. The payouts from local games, appearances for Delhi U-25 and net bowler stint allowed him to upgrade his two-wheeler to a Royal Enfield Bullet but the drive to challenge himself in different T20 games only increased.For those who have watched him from a young age, it doesn't come as a surprise that he has conceded just three sixes in four IPL games. All those sixes came against a marauding Sunrisers Hyderabad.He had learnt his lesson during those trials back in the day, and it was his life challenges and the obsession to play the IPL which shaped the bowler he is now.For a bowler who was picked as a backup for Ravi Bishnoi and M Siddharth, Rathi has stormed into a leading role for the Rishabh Pant-led unit and has become the toast of the nation for his celebrations and ice-cool temperament in pressure situations.
Article Summary: Digvesh singh rathi is a bowler who modelled his game by watching sunil narine. Rathi has played nearly 300 local games, had a stint with delhi capitals as a net bowler. His paddle went up at the ipl mega auction in 2024 when lucknow super giants secured him. All those sixes came against a marauding sunrisers hyderabad.

Article Title: 'Sir why worry...': LSG owner Sanjiv Goenka has a laugh with Rishabh Pant, Rohit Sharma, Shardul Thakur after beating MI - WATCH
Article Text:
LSG owner Sanjiv Goenka with players Rishabh Pant, Shardul Thakur and MI's Rohit Sharma after IPL 2025 match. (Image: X)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Lucknow Super Giants secured a victory against Mumbai Indians in Friday's IPL 2025 match at Ekana Cricket Stadium, posting 203/8 before restricting MI to 191/5. Team owner Sanjiv Goenka was spotted in good spirits after the win, engaging in a friendly conversation with LSG captain Rishabh Pant , seamer Shardul Thakur and MI's Rohit Sharma A social media video captured the moment showing Goenka patting Pant's shoulder while chatting with the players after the match. In another video, shared by the team, Rohit urged Goenka to not worry when they have 'Lord' Shardul Thakur in their midst.Rohit Sharma was absent from the game due to a knee injury sustained during training, as stated by Mumbai Indians captain Hardik Pandya at the toss.The win propelled LSG to the sixth position on the IPL 2025 points table , marking their second victory in four matches. Meanwhile, Mumbai Indians dropped to seventh place after suffering their third loss in four games.LSG's concerns persist regarding captain Pant's batting performance, who has only managed 19 runs across four matches, with his highest score of 15 coming against Sunrisers Hyderabad.Also See: IPL Live Score, DC vs CSK Pant, who joined LSG for a record-breaking IPL fee of Rs 27 crore in the mega auction, was brought in to improve the team's fortunes following a disappointing previous season.The team appeared satisfied with the pitch conditions, despite earlier concerns raised by team mentor Zaheer Khan about its suitability for their playing style."One thing is sure is that the wicket is playing really well, and we need to figure out what's working for us and what is not. Before we wanted a different kind of wicket, but whatever was offered to us we will take it and play," Pant remarked after the match.Lucknow Super Giants' next challenge will be against Kolkata Knight Riders at Eden Gardens on Tuesday, April 8.
Article Summary: Lucknow super giants beat mumbai indians in ipl 2025 match. Lsg posted 203/8 before restricting mi to 191/5 at ekana cricket stadium. Captain rishabh pant scored 19 runs in four matches for lsg. Mumbai indians suffered their third loss in four games.

Article Title: MS Dhoni Retirement: 'Not my role to put an end to it': Stephen Fleming on MS Dhoni retirement buzz amid CSK struggles
Article Text:
MS Dhoni (Pic credit: IPL)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll What matters more in IPL success? Team Balance And Strategy Star Power And Experience

IPL: Fleming admits batting woes after CSK's third straight defeat

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings head coach Stephen Fleming has brushed aside retirement speculation surrounding MS Dhoni, stating that it’s not his role to end the legendary cricketer’s IPL career. The chatter gained momentum after Dhoni’s parents were spotted at the MA Chidambaram Stadium during CSK’s 25-run defeat to Delhi Capitals on Saturday — their third straight loss in IPL 2025 .“No, that’s not my role to put an end to it. I have no idea. I’m just enjoying working with him. He’s still going strong,” Fleming said at the post-match press conference. “I don’t even ask these days. You guys are the ones that ask.”Dhoni walked in at No. 7 with CSK reeling at 74/5 in the 11th over, but could only manage a 26-ball 30 not out , struggling to find momentum on a slowing pitch. Fleming defended the move, saying it wasn’t a damage-control tactic, but a reflection of tough batting conditions in the second half.“When he went out, the ball started to grip more. Vijay [Shankar] struggled throughout. That 12-16 over period was just very hard to bat. The game was slipping, and even with intent, it was just too much,” he added.On CSK’s continued inconsistency, Fleming stressed the need for more from the top order. “We need more production from the top three or four. That allows power hitters to come in at the right time. Right now, we’re having to introduce players at the wrong moments.”Despite the growing scrutiny, Fleming reaffirmed faith in Dhoni and the team's process.
Article Summary: Csk lost 25-run to delhi capitals in the ipl on saturday. Ms dhoni's parents were spotted at the ma chidambaram stadium. Head coach stephen fleming says it's not his role to end the legendary cricketer's ipl career.

Article Title: IPL 2025: MS Dhoni, Vijay Shankar create unwanted records in CSK's sluggish chase against DC
Article Text:
Chennai Super Kings' MS Dhoni and Vijay Shankar (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Slowest 50s in IPL 2025 (by balls)

43 - V Shankar CSK vs DC in Chennai

in Chennai 42 - R Ravindra CSK vs MI in Chennai

40 - Y Jaiswal RR vs PBKS in Chandigarh

39 - L Livingstone RCB vs GT in Bengaluru

37 - R Gaikwad CSK vs RR in Guwahati

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Chennai Super Kings ' lack of urgency in a tricky chase cost them dearly as they slumped to a 25-run defeat against Delhi Capitals in their Indian Premier League 2025 clash at the MA Chidambaram Stadium on Saturday.Chasing 184, CSK were reeling at 74/5 in 10.4 overs when MS Dhoni walked in — his earliest entry in a full 20-over match since 2023. With 110 needed off 56 balls, he joined Vijay Shankar , who was on 24 off 23. The stage was set for a counterattack, but what followed was a sluggish and baffling passage of play.Despite their reputation as big-hitters, Dhoni and Shankar crawled to just 32 runs in the next 4.2 overs. Shankar eventually brought up his fifty in the 17th over off 43 balls — the slowest half-century of the season. Alarmingly, CSK now account for three of the four slowest fifties in IPL 2025 , raising concerns over the intent of their batters.Also See: IPL Live Score, PBKS vs RR Dhoni, too, endured a forgettable outing. His first boundary — a six off Mukesh Kumar — came off the 19th ball he faced, the slowest any batter has taken to hit a boundary in this season. Though the duo added an unbeaten 84-run partnership, it came in 9.2 overs — far too passive to make an impact.Earlier, KL Rahul anchored Delhi’s innings with a classy 77 off 51 balls to take them to 183/6. With this win, DC remain unbeaten while CSK’s stuttering campaign continues.
Article Summary: Chennai super kings slump to 25-run defeat against delhi capitals. Ms dhoni and vijay shankar score 32 runs in next 4.2 overs. Csk now account for three of the four slowest fifties in ipl 2025.

Article Title: Watch: Hardik Pandya struggles to hold back emotions after Mumbai Indians' latest IPL defeat to LSG
Article Text:
Emotional Hardik Pandya (Photo Credit: X)

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: Hardik Pandya couldn’t hide his disappointment as Mumbai Indians fell short in a thrilling IPL 2025 contest against Lucknow Super Giants . Despite delivering a career-best performance with the ball, the MI skipper was visibly emotional after the 12-run defeat at the Ekana Stadium in Lucknow.After the match, once the players had completed the customary handshakes, Pandya was seen isolating himself in a corner of the ground, clearly distraught. Cameras caught the emotional moment as the all-rounder seemed to be blaming himself for not being able to finish the chase in a game where Mumbai were in control for large parts.Watch:Pandya’s 5/36 (his first five-wicket haul in T20s) had earlier given MI hope as they restricted LSG to 203 for 8 after being asked to bowl.Also See: PBKS vs RR Live Score, IPL 2025 However, despite a fluent 67 by Suryakumar Yadav and contributions from Naman Dhir (32) and Tilak Varma (25), MI could only muster 191/5 in their 20 overs.In the final over, MI needed 22 runs.Pandya smashed a six off the first ball from Avesh Khan, but two crucial dot balls and a single on the fifth delivery left MI with no way back.The failure to find boundaries in the last two overs proved costly, especially after Shardul Thakur’s tight penultimate over.Earlier in the match, LSG rode on blistering half-centuries from Mitchell Marsh (60 off 31) and Aiden Markram (53 off 38) to get past 200.Pandya led a strong MI comeback by dismissing both top scorers and picking up five key wickets to stall LSG’s momentum.Still, the all-rounder’s valiant effort wasn’t enough.The heartbreak of a missed opportunity was written all over Pandya’s face as MI suffered yet another close defeat.His emotional reaction has since gone viral, with fans and experts expressing both support and concern for the MI skipper as he continues to carry the weight of expectations.
Article Summary: Hardik pandya was visibly emotional after the 12-run defeat to lucknow super giants. The mi skipper was seen isolating himself in a corner of the ground, clearly distraught. Pandya’s 5/36 (his first five-wicket haul in t20s) had earlier given mi hope.

Article Title: Rohit Sharma Injury Update: 'Unfortunate what happened ...': Mumbai Indians head coach Mahela Jayawardene shares details of Rohit Sharma's injury
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Will Rohit Sharma’s absence impact Mumbai Indians’ playoff chances? No, MI can still make it through Yes, he's crucial to the team

Jos Buttler Exclusive Interview: I owe Jayawardene for letting me open in T20

NEW DELHI: Mumbai Indians head coach Mahela Jayawardene has confirmed that Rohit Sharma missed the IPL 2025 match against Lucknow Super Giants after sustaining a knee injury during practice, leaving fans and the team sweating over the star opener’s fitness."Rohit got a hit on his knee just in the IT band and he tried to bat yesterday, couldn't put any weight on it," Jayawardene revealed during the post-match press conference. "So again he came and did a fitness test early today to try and it was discomfort for him to bat, put weight on that."With Rohit unable to move freely, the team opted for caution. "He felt that it wasn't 100% for him to play this game so that's why we precautioned," Jayawardene added, explaining the decision to rest the veteran batter.Also See: PBKS vs RR, IPL Live Score Jayawardene also gave a glimpse into the next steps: "We thought give him a few more days to try and get through that... unfortunate what happened in the nets."The injury raised alarm on social media after a video showed Rohit gingerly climbing stairs using his bat for support, sparking concerns about the severity of the knock.Rohit, who has endured a poor run with the bat this season, was seen as vital to MI’s revival. His absence in a critical phase of the tournament adds pressure on a team looking to bounce back.The franchise hopes for a swift recovery as fans await further updates.
Article Summary: Mumbai indians head coach mahela jayawardene confirms that rohit sharma will miss the ipl 2025 match against lucknow super giants. Sharma sustained a knee injury during practice. The injury raised alarm on social media after a video showed sharma gingerly climbing stairs using his bat for support.

Article Title: History made! Delhi Capitals finally break 15-year curse against CSK in Chennai
Article Text:
Mitchell Starc (PTI Photo)

Poll Which Feat Feels Bigger For Delhi Capitals Fans? Securing 3 Wins On The Trot Breaking The 15-Year Chepauk Curse

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: It’s an evening to remember for the Delhi Capitals (DC) as they scripted history by defeating Chennai Super Kings (CSK) at the MA Chidambaram Stadium after 15 long years.The win not only ended a painful streak but also marked DC’s third consecutive victory in IPL 2025 — a feat they last managed way back in 2009.Also See: IPL Live Score, RR vs PBKS With this emphatic 25-run win, Delhi also climbed to the top of the points table, while CSK slumped to their third straight defeat.The match began on a shaky note for DC after Jake Fraser-McGurk fell for a duck in the first over.But KL Rahul, promoted to open in Faf du Plessis ’s absence, steadied the innings with a composed 77 off 51 balls.Support came from young guns Abishek Porel and Sameer Rizvi, while Tristan Stubbs provided the late flourish with a fiery 24 not out off just 12 deliveries.Despite Matheesha Pathirana’s death-over heroics, DC posted a competitive 183/6.In response, CSK’s chase never really took off.Wickets kept tumbling at regular intervals. Vipraj Nigam impressed with a double-strike, including the key wicket of Devon Conway.With Ravindra Jadeja and Shivam Dube dismissed cheaply and MS Dhoni arriving, the hosts ran out of steam.CSK managed just 158/5 in their 20 overs, falling short by 25 runs.For Delhi, the bowling unit delivered as a cohesive force. Mitchell Starc, Kuldeep Yadav , and Mukesh Kumar kept things tight, while captain Axar Patel’s decision-making proved spot on.The Capitals’ long-standing Chennai hoodoo is finally over. From breaking a 15-year curse at Chepauk to winning three games on the trot, DC look like a team reborn. As for CSK, alarm bells may be ringing as they slip down the table with worrying consistency.
Article Summary: Delhi capitals beat chennai super kings by 25 runs. It is delhi's third consecutive victory in ipl 2025. Delhi climb to the top of the points table, while csk slump to their third straight defeat. Kl rahul top scored with 77 off 51 balls for delhi.

Article Title: Sanju Samson captains Rajasthan Royals for the first time in IPL 2025
Article Text:
Sanju Samson (Image credit: BCCI/IPL)

Poll Who do you think will win today's match between Punjab Kings and Rajasthan Royals? Rajasthan Royals Punjab Kings

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

Playing XIs

NEW DELHI: Punjab Kings skipper Shreyas Iyer won the toss and opted to bowl first against Rajasthan Royals in their IPL 2025 clash at Mullanpur on Saturday.The hosts have gone in with an unchanged playing XI from their previous outing. Meanwhile, Rajasthan Royals welcomed back Sanju Samson , who takes over the captaincy from Riyan Parag . This marks Samson’s first match as RR captain this season.Also See: IPL Live Score, RR vs PBKS After donning the role of the Impact Player for the first three games of the season while recovering from a finger injury, Samson is captaining Rajasthan Royals for the first time in IPL 2025.PBKS are brimming with confidence, heading into their first home game of the season, after launching their campaign with two back-to-back wins under the leadership of Shreyas Iyer, who has smashed consecutive half-centuries to score 149 runs in two games at a strike rate of over 200.In their bowling unit, led by Arshdeep Singh, Vijaykumar Vyshak is one to watch out for, after the 28-year-old rookie made an instant impact in PBKS' season-opening win against Gujarat Titans, delivering game-changing performances coming in as an impact sub that caught everyone’s attention.“Looking at the last game, we were playing on a new wicket and we want to see how the pitch plays. Same mindset here as well. We need to stabilise the rhythm from game one, and that's happened. Important to steady the ship from here; the boys are in high spirits. Need to maintain composure and calmness throughout the season. We've played the practice games here, so we know how the wicket will play. We played our last two games on red soil, so hopefully we can adapt early,” said Iyer at the toss.Rajasthan Royals beat Chennai Super Kings by six runs in their previous outing with Nitish Rana and Wanindu Hasaranga playing starring roles with the bat and ball, respectively. They currently sit in the 9th spot in the table having lost two of their opening three games. The Royals made only one change to their side as Tushar Deshpande missed out because of a small injury, and Yudhvir Singh comes in.“Pretty happy to bat first and put on a decent total. I could feel what the coaches would be going through, a bit restless and helpless. But excited to be back now. It is a new team and team management, we have got to know each other now, and it takes a bit of time. We are feeling better now, last game we pretty much had the perfect game. We have a small niggle for Tushar Despande, so he's out for today and Yudhvir comes in for him,” said Samson at the tossPunjab Kings: Prabhsimran Singh (wk), Shreyas Iyer (c), Marcus Stoinis, Nehal Wadhera, Glenn Maxwell, Shashank Singh, Suryansh Shedge, Marco Jansen, Arshdeep Singh, Lockie Ferguson, Yuzvendra Chahal.Rajasthan Royals: Yashasvi Jaiswal, Sanju Samson (c), Nitish Rana, Riyan Parag, Dhruv Jurel (wk), Shimron Hetmyer, Wanindu Hasaranga, Jofra Archer, Maheesh Theekshana, Yudhvir Singh Charak, Sandeep Sharma.
Article Summary: Punjab kings skipper shreyas iyer won the toss and opted to bowl first. Rajasthan royals welcomed back sanju samson who takes over the captaincy from riyan parag. Tushar despande missed out because of a small injury, and yudhvir singh comes in.

Article Title: IPL 2025: KL Rahul masterclass powers Delhi Capitals to historic win over Chennai Super Kings at Chepauk
Article Text:
Delhi Capitals batter KL Rahul plays a shot in Chennai. (PTI Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel.

Poll Which Was The Game-Changer In The DC vs CSK Clash? Early Wickets In The Powerplay KL Rahul’s Anchor Knock

Bombay Sport Exchange Ep. 2: GroupM's Vinit Karnik on IPL's growth and emerging sports

NEW DELHI: KL Rahul played a sublime knock under pressure to steer Delhi Capitals to their third straight victory in the Indian Premier League 2025, defeating Chennai Super Kings by 25 runs at the MA Chidambaram Stadium on Saturday. With this win, DC not only extended their unbeaten streak this season but also scripted their first win at Chepauk in 15 years.The foundation of Delhi’s 183/6 was built on Rahul’s elegant yet powerful 77 off 51 deliveries. Mixing finesse with brute force, the stylish right-hander struck six boundaries and three sixes, anchoring the innings masterfully. Despite a shaky start — losing Jake Fraser-McGurk early to Khaleel Ahmed — Delhi recovered through Abishek Porel’s brisk 33 off 20 and a steady middle-order partnership between Rahul and Sameer Rizvi (20).While Tristan Stubbs added a quickfire 24 not out at the end, Matheesha Pathirana’s tidy final over ensured CSK restricted DC from posting a bigger total.In reply, CSK stumbled early in their chase. Ruturaj Gaikwad, Rachin Ravindra and Devon Conway fell inside the powerplay, with Mitchell Starc, Mukesh Kumar and young spinner Vipraj Nigam (2/27) denting the top order. At 41/3, CSK were always chasing the game.Vijay Shankar fought hard with a well-made 69 not out, and MS Dhoni remained unbeaten on 30, but the asking rate kept climbing. With the pitch offering grip and Delhi’s bowlers maintaining discipline, Chennai managed only 158/5 in their 20 overs.Earlier, DC captain Axar Patel’s cameo (21 off 14) and his six off Jadeja hinted at a flourish, but he too fell after getting set. Rahul, meanwhile, held one end firmly and reached his 38th IPL fifty in style. His knock not only stabilised DC’s innings but also allowed others to play freely around him.With three wins in three games, Delhi Capitals look like early title contenders. For CSK, however, the loss marks a worrying trend, with questions looming over their inconsistent top order and inability to control games at home.
Article Summary: Delhi capitals beat chennai super kings by 25 runs at the ma chidambaram stadium. Delhi's 183/6 was built on kl rahul's elegant yet powerful 77 off 51 deliveries. Chennai managed only 158/5 in their 20 overs.

Article Title: Aaron Rodgers’ quiet stance reportedly signals a shift away from Pittsburgh Steelers toward Minnesota Vikings
Article Text:
Credit: Getty Images

Aaron Rodgers' NFL future hangs in the balance – And the Steelers may be left waiting



Wild Steelers Trade, Aaron Rodgers Decision | AST Call-In Show

As the NFL offseason rolls forward and the 2025 Draft looms closer, one name continues to dominate headlines—Aaron Rodgers. Despite his decorated career and four MVP awards, Rodgers remains unsigned, and all eyes are on what has become one of the league’s most compelling storylines. Among the teams reportedly most invested in his future are the Pittsburgh Steelers, who appear all-in on the 41-year-old quarterback. But with every day that passes, hope in Pittsburgh may be giving way to uncertainty.The Steelers, who lost both Russell Wilson and Justin Fields in free agency, have cleared the deck in their quarterback room—placing their faith firmly in Aaron Rodgers. Currently, only Mason Rudolph and Skylar Thompson remain on the roster, neither seen as a long-term solution. With the Steelers clearly banking on Rodgers to stabilize their offense, any hesitation from his camp could be detrimental.Owner and president Art Rooney II recently admitted, “We keep getting positive sort of signals about it. So yeah, I’d say we feel pretty good about it at this point.” Still, even he hinted that patience won’t be endless, stating Rodgers has “not forever, but a little while longer” to decide.But behind the scenes, conflicting opinions are surfacing. According to Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio, one “high-level” NFL executive offered a different take on Rodgers’ true intentions: “The opinion is he doesn’t really want to play for the Steelers, and he’s waiting for Minnesota.” Florio clarified, “It’s not a fact; it’s not a report. But it’s somebody who is in the ecosystem and isn’t a low-level employee.”This speculation adds a new twist. While the Minnesota Vikings had previously expressed interest, they appear to have committed to second-year quarterback J.J. McCarthy. Yet, the possibility remains that Rodgers is hoping for a last-minute opening in Minnesota’s quarterback room—leaving Pittsburgh as more of a fallback than a preferred destination.Steelers head coach Mike Tomlin , known for his calm demeanor, is reportedly giving Rodgers space and not imposing any hard deadlines. When asked about whether a deadline had been set, Tomlin responded, “Not to my knowledge. I don’t know that we’ve approached it from a deadline perspective.” Still, the absence of urgency doesn’t eliminate the pressure mounting within the organization.Interestingly, Rodgers had already visited the Steelers’ facility back in March and even held a throwing session with newly acquired wide receiver DK Metcalf. That interaction was viewed by many as a promising sign, one that suggested Rodgers was seriously weighing the move. But weeks later, no decision has been made—and silence often speaks volumes in the NFL.At 41, Rodgers holds all the cards. He can afford to wait, watch, and choose his next destination carefully—or even walk away from the game altogether. While retirement hasn’t been publicly discussed as a likely option, it still lingers in the realm of possibilities.Also Read: Could the Giants really draft both Travis Hunter and Shedeur Sanders in 2025? Mel Kiper Jr. believes so For Pittsburgh Steelers, the stakes are high. A missed opportunity with Rodgers could leave them scrambling with limited quarterback options and a fanbase left wondering what could have been. The longer this saga stretches on, the more it looks like the Steelers’ gamble could backfire—unless Aaron Rodgers finally breaks his silence in their favor.
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers remains unsigned despite his decorated career and four mvp awards. Among the teams reportedly most invested in his future are the pittsburgh steelers, who appear all-in on the 41-year-old quarterback. But with every day that passes, hope in pittsburgh may be giving way to uncertainty.
